text: Memorial, Kensal Green Cemetery Philip Cadell Peebles (1842-1895) was a British paper manufacturer and racehorse owner. He was head of A. M. Peebles and Son, Rishton and Whiteash Mills, Lancashire. In 1879, he bought the Rishton Paper Making and Staining Co., Ltd, which was formed in 1874, but went into liquidation in 1878. There was a serious fire on 6 April 1883, a three storey building was gutted, and three tons of Esparto grass was destroyed. There was insurance cover. Rishton Mill was closed by Robert Maxwell in February 1981. ==References== Category:1842 births Category:1895 deaths Category:Burials at Kensal Green Cemetery Category:British racehorse owners and breeders
title: Philip Cadell Peebles
